body.description: The Graco® Premier Midtown™ collection is tailored with premium materials and design. The Graco® Premier Modes™ Lux Stroller offers you and your child more ways to stroll together, from baby to big kid. It's 3 strollers in 1—infant car seat carrier, infant carry cot, and toddler stroller—for a versatile stroll from infant to toddler (infant car seat and carry cot sold separately). With the Modes™ Lux Stroller, every ride is convenient as the seat folds in rear or forward-facing mode for easy, compact storage and transportation. Extra touches include a height-adjustable vegan leather handle and belly bar, calf support, in-seat suspension, parent cup holder, and a large canopy to ensure baby is comfortable for every stroll.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Graco Premier Modes Lux Stroller The Graco Premier line offers premium materials and design. The Graco Premier Modes Lux Stroller offers you and your child more ways to stroll together. This 3-in-1 stroller can be used as an infant car seat carrier, infant carry cot, and toddler stroller (infant car seat and carry cot sold separately). Every ride is convenient with features such as a one-hand stroller fold and a reversible seat to face parent or the world. The perfect stroller for: Those who want a stroller that's as stylish as it is functional Those looking for a 3-in-1 stroller to grow with their child Caregivers who want the option to easily create a travel system

Features Designed for You Reversible Seat Reversible stroller seat can face parent or the world. 3-in-1 Design 3 strollers in 1: Infant Car Seat Carrier, Infant Carry Cot, Toddler Stroller (infant car seat and carry cot sold separately). One-Hand Fold One-hand, compact fold with folding seat in rear- or forward-facing mode for easy storage and transportation. Height-Adjustable Handle Height-adjustable, stylish vegan leather handle provides a smoother grip.

More to Love Expandable Canopy Large expandable canopy offers added shade and comfort for your child. Adjustable Calf Support Adjustable calf support lets your growing child ride comfortably. All-Terrain Tires All-terrain tires give you and baby the smoothest riding experience on any surface. The Midtown Collection Soft woven fabrics in geometric quilting are complemented by two-tone fabrics in shades of gray with rich coffee vegan leather accents. Shop the entire collection for a perfectly coordinated registry.
Graco Premier From the brand you know and trust, the Graco Premier line offers premium materials, design, and details.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product is ideal for a family and moves easily over heavy terrain. The overall quality of this is great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great all terrain for the price
reviews.reviewText: Great price for an all terrain stroller. Love how my snugride car seat attaches to it, I did not need to buy the lux car seat that goes with the collection. Also great that the car seat adapters come in the box, you do not need to purchase separately like most strollers.Also the stroller does fold with the seat attached to it. Unlike how other review says it doesnt.The car seat on the other hand, to fold stroller you need to remove the adapters before folding

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: There is a lot of things to like about this stroler - large rubber wheels, leather wrapped handle. It's also not very heavy and folds easily. Good build quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Graco For The Win
reviews.reviewText: This stroller arrived quickly and well packaged with all parts and pieces present. The stroller is relatively easy to put together especially if you have had experience with these kinds of items in the past. It has a variety of really nice features that make traveling with your kiddo more enjoyable. You can adjust the hand bar for parents to the desired position, and the toddler foot rest is adjustable as well. It drives so incredibly smooth, which is one of the reasons I love this and it handles well on various different terrain and flooring. The seat is able to be flipped around so you can do forward or rear facing and it can be folded up easily in either position. The other great feature is that you can swap it out to use with the matching car seat or cot if you so choose to get them, giving this stroller that much more longevity. There is ample under seat storage for large diaper bags or if you’re shopping downtown and need somewhere to keep some bags. The price point is on the high end but you are not just buying a stroller, it is a convertible stroller which is so useful. Overall, this is a fantastic product that would work for any gender and seems to be comfortable for both parent and child. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very difficult stroller to put together and use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Lightweight, nice for a variety of positions and ages. I do not find this too heavy or hard to fold. It's easy to maneuver. I do wish that the canopies dropped lower in general on strollers, but it's not bad. A little bit pricey, but it is very nice if you can afford it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stroller
reviews.reviewText: Definitely a Lux stroller, it’s easy to assemble and I love the design and color scheme. It’s perfect for boys or girls and I like theat it’s a 3 in 1. Very Very satisfied, I love this stroller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this stroller!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this to stroll around my Grandchildren when they come to visit. They are several different ages, and I love how this is a three in one design so I can use it on the different ages. It is easy to fold, easy to adjust, and it has nice tires. Graco is a premier trusted brand and this stroller is a great one and should last us for years!
